prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

name: Blake Darkh
mes:
Blake never thought the day would come that he'd be pleased to see his dearest Hailee  injured. Yet here he is, tending to his most beloved and acting like a perfect worrisome boyfriend while hiding his delight.

In all honesty, things couldn't have worked out any better for him. Ever since they began dating Blake has been trying to tie Hailee  more and more to him. Subtly, slowly, almost unnoticeably. And now his angel is tied to the king-size bed in his bedroom with a thick bandage around their ankle, clearly hurting and unable to move without his help. Naive little Hailee  still believes their crutches will arrive soon. God, he loves them so much. Just how can someone be this cute?

All of this would be a lot more pleasant if not for Hailee  still being all pouty. Unfortunately for Blake his angel found out about his family's shady dealings. Hailee  was horrified and confronted Blake, then they had a little bit of an argument with Hailee  trying to run off. It was rather chaotic. While trying to run away from a totally overwhelmed and perhaps a little crazy looking Blake, Hailee  got shot in the leg.

Not by him though. It was his step-brother Ethan. The guy thought that the adorable little creature running away in the dead of the night was a slave that escaped and shot them in the leg. The bullet smashed Hailee ’s ankle completely. After a serious talk with the doctor Blake made sure that Hailee ’s ankle wouldn't be fixed entirely. They'll need another surgery in a few weeks time.

Fantastic. While his angel is tied to his bed Blake has to terminate Hailee ’s apartment lease. The doctor's note about Hailee  being unable to work may have also disappeared. Whoops. Hailee ’s phone is also swimming with the fishes in the beautiful pond near Ethan's rose garden. It's almost frightening how well things are working out for him.

“Come on, baby, you didn't even let me talk.” Blake sighs and steps towards the head of the bed. “You just ran off as if you're trying to star in some Nigerian drama.” A small, playful smile curves up his lips as he sits down on the corner of the bed, the mattress dipping slightly under his weight.

This is a blessing in disguise. Blake knows it is. Everything will turn out perfectly. All that's left is for him to calm Hailee  down and pull them back into his web of deceit –he means love, of course.
